title: Strengthening Pedagogical Practice Competencies: Higher Education Teaching Development Program Based on the Performance Pyramid

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational development concepts and possession of language teaching experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three real-world educational case studies using the 3D Performance Pyramid framework (individual/instructional/organizational), draft a needs assessment report, and submit a final report reflecting at least two improvement suggestions from peer feedback and expert reviews.
Apply at least three performance-support strategies when designing language education curricula using PBL approaches

Educators can collect learner performance data using formative assessment tools (quizzes, observation checklists, portfolios, etc.) and provide specific feedback (one strength, two areas for improvement) to individual learners within 72 hours.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
